text: "Amazing" is a 1993 song by American hard rock band Aerosmith and is the fifth single from their 11th studio album Get a Grip. It went to number 24 in the United States, number 58 in the United Kingdom, number 2 in Iceland, number 4 in Canada, number 7 in Portugal, number 5 in Norway and number 12 in the Netherlands. ==Track listing== ==Notes== Category:1993 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Aerosmith songs
title: Amazing (Aerosmith song)
